front.title: New protocol elements for HTTP Status Code 451

abstract.t: This document recommends additional protocol elements to Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) status code 451 (defined by RFC7725). Discussion of this document was conducted on the Human Rights Protocol Considerations Research Group mailing list https://www.irtf.org/mailman/listinfo/hrpc [1], briefly on the HTTPBIS Working Group mailing list ietf-http-wg@w3.org [2] and on https://lists.ghserv.net/mailman/listinfo/statuscode451 [3].
